title: Pâte sucrée (sweet shortcrust pastry)
description: This rich, sweet pastry makes a delicious base for chocolate tarts or fruit pies.

default: 200g/7oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting

steps: Cream the butter and sugar together in a bowl until well combined, then beat in the egg yolks, one at a time until fully incorporated into the mixture.
Mix in the flour until the mixture comes together as a ball of dough.
Tip the pastry out onto a floured work surface and knead briefly until smooth.
Wrap the pastry in cling film and chill for 30 minutes. Alternatively, it can be frozen for use at a later date.
